name: SMILES Transformer
innovation_summary: Introduced transformer encoders over SMILES strings with transfer learning for molecular property prediction.

name: MolBERT
innovation_summary: Performed masked LM pretraining on curated chemical corpora with chemically aware tokenisation.

name: ChemBERTa
innovation_summary: Released open-source RoBERTa models on PubChem SMILES with standard fine-tuning recipes.

name: MegaMolBART
innovation_summary: Adopted BART denoising objectives for conditional molecular generation and optimisation.

name: MolGPT
innovation_summary: Applied GPT-style autoregressive decoding conditioned on property descriptors for de novo molecule synthesis.

name: GeoMol
innovation_summary: Combined graph neural networks with autoregressive decoding to respect 3D conformational constraints during generation.

name: Chemformer
innovation_summary: Unified reaction prediction and molecular optimisation with multitask sequence-to-sequence transfer learning.

name: ChemGPT
innovation_summary: Scaled autoregressive SMILES transformers to billion-parameter regimes with retrieval-augmented sampling.

name: MolMIM
innovation_summary: Blended masked infilling with reinforcement learning to steer molecules toward multi-property targets using expert feedback.

name: DrugGPT
innovation_summary: Integrated reinforcement learning with human-in-the-loop molecule editing for rapid lead discovery workflows.

name: ChemLLaMA
innovation_summary: Instruction-tuned a general chemical language model on laboratory protocols to support synthesis planning and property reasoning.

name: SynMoGEN
innovation_summary: Incorporated retrosynthesis constraints and lab automation feedback to propose synthesizable molecules.
